title: URF in the Rotation?
body:
Hey guys i just wanted to know if URF is in the rotation for the revolving weekend gamemodes??? Because ive played LoL for 3 years so far and not once have i actually got to play URF {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} because i had no internet for the duration and it seems like a really fun gamemode.
and as of today nexus siege has been in the rotation twice but not URF so i'll be kinda sad if its not :{

replies.body: All random URF is in three weeks, not the normal URF
ARAM URF is coming on the [23rd](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/oce/esports/RGM_1_09_NexusSiege.jpg&resize=1024:) bby!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Tele,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=KHvRZgiv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-02T04:54:15.456+0000)
>
> ARAM URF is coming on the [23rd](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/oce/esports/RGM_1_09_NexusSiege.jpg&resize=1024:) bby!!!

ON MY BIRTHDAY YYYYYYEEEEEESSSS ILY RITO

Eyyyy mines on the 24th! Can't wait :D
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

I would be surprised if we see another (normal) summoners rift URF in 2016. They did mention it would come atleast twice this year, but seem content on making it a rare thing for reasons only known to them. ARAM urf will be fun to try, and quite hectic i'm looking forward to that!

But unfortunately the lovers of URF will just have to be patient for the couple times a year we given this crazy fun mode
